name: A Shot in the Dark (Alien Tate, physicsGameDev, Nick Burger Games, Boy)
name_original: A Shot in the Dark (Alien Tate, physicsGameDev, Nick Burger Games, Boy)
description:
As a survivor of a zombie apocalypse, you must venture into the dark forest in search of a rumored camp of survivors. With help from a friendly ghost, scavenge weapons and ammo to defend yourself against the undead horde.

CONTROLS:

A: Move Left

D: Move Right

SPACE: Jump

S: Drop Down

LEFT CLICK: Use Weapon

E: Pick Up Item

123/Scroll Wheel: Select Equipped Weapon

Credits: Some of our assets were from pixabay, mixkit, dyru, Kauss, Chrisblue (Open game art: font type7r), Zabin on OpenGameArt, Bradfrey, and Jere Sikstus.
